name: Add a new row into a Google Sheets spreadsheet from a modified deal in Bitrix24
description:
This template regularly checks for deal updates in Bitrix24 and uses the retrieved information to create rows in Google Sheets spreadsheet. 

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/14ED2-7qmp2IDMwcNqeY-fGPVa-6QCTY47nmkyhlfUKc/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as the destination for the Bitrix24 deals. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
